title: Scalable and Fast Optical Circuit Switch Exploiting Colorless Coherent Detection
venue: Optical Fiber Communications Conference and Exhibition
abstract: We present a scalable and fast wavelength-routing switch employing colorless coherent detection. Some thousand port-count and a few microsecond switching time are realized by using a Silicon-Photonic tunable-filter-based local oscillator bank that enables colorless detection.
